website_summaries.verdict: Because it's not just about kicking. This board's finger scallops and grooves on the sides and bottom help promote proper swimming hand position.
pros: Made of lightweight, textured EVA foam
Side finger scallops promote proper hand position
Underside finger grooves for nonslip grip
Back end is curved, so it's comfortable on the chest
cons: May arrive with a chemical smell
This should dissipate with use in the water

customer_reviews.title: It does what you want
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of using the old kickboard's at the YMCA I swim at. They can be hard to come by and are never in good condition. I've always been happy with Speedo's swim equipment so I decided to pick up their kickboard. After a few swims it's a great board! It's lightweight. Right amount of buoyancy. The grips on the side are really handy. It looks sleek. It feels solid and high quality. Doesn't drag through the water. Basically it's what you want in a kickboard. I read a lot of reviewers complaining about the smell. I didn't notice anything bad, a slight "new" smell. But after a few swims it was gone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Learning, but Stinks
customer_reviews.text: This product is getting four stars because of the strong plastic smell which transfers to my workout clothes and other gym paraphernalia. If kept aside from everything else, this is a good device which helped me with swimming a lot. Great buoyancy, the piece stays strong on water. The shape makes it glide through water seamlessly which allows for little extra friction while swimming. Ridges on the side allows for a good grip. The material is durable and the board is quite hard to break in normal use.
customer_reviews.author: SashaTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: "One Size" does NOT mean Adult Size.
customer_reviews.text: "One size" does NOT mean adult size. Measures 1.05" max thickness. Picture doesn't show the 24+ inch long "Underside finger grooves" channel carved out of the backside. Don't be fooled, the "Side finger scallops" and "Underside finger grooves" are not useful features. They save Speedo money by eliminating material while sacrificing buoyancy. I've swam competitively for 16 yrs and never once held a kickboad where the "Side finger scallops" are located. I've always rested the entire length of my arm(s) on the board and gripped the front. I'm 185lbs and this kickboard can't generate enough buoyancy to lift your face/mouth out of the water while looking forward. Also, this kickboard is made in Vietnam. I returned for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: This is a great kickboard, its made of quality foam that doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kickboard, its made of quality foam that doesn't retain water like a lot of the kickboards I've used in the past. The board is textured and groves which make it easy to grip and hold onto in the water. Small enough to fit in a swim bag but sturdy enough to help keep you afloat for workouts. My only complaint is the smell when you first get it, it's a very strong foam plastic smell but after a few hours in the pool it goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Jbarr

customer_reviews.title: Great for isolating and toning legs
customer_reviews.text: This is my new pool buddy! I'm trying to tone my arms and legs and this has been a great help. It's a lot more sturdy than the boards provided by my gym, which allows me to do some tough arm workouts with it. My ferrets have scratched the hell out of it and there's barely any sign of damage....this thing is super durable!
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Not for adults; too small
customer_reviews.text: I chose this item because it was the largest board I could find. Although it says for adults I don’t believe it will hold up most adults. My husband sank when he used it (he is about 190 lbs). I actually bought it for my 8 pound dog to ride on while he’s in the pool with us. Obviously at 8 pounds he’s a small dog and he barely fit on it. It was very unstable and we had to fight to keep him above water without wobbling off. I was very disappointed. This might be ideal for kids 50 pounds and under.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Kick builder smell tips!
customer_reviews.text: Our 16-year-old joined her first ever swim team this year. The full team was assigned to each buy a board and my daughter chose Speedo. New to competitive swimming, she had great instincts but had much to catch up in training and technique. Four months later, the difference is her tone, and confidence is remarkable. The board is still in excellent condition yet try to find a spot to leave it out to dry. If it starts to smell a bit, rub it hard with a dish scrubee with a solution of 25% bleach to water, rinse thoroughly, and leave in the sun to dry. Her Speedo is alive and KICKIN’ after daily workouts in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but it smells really, really bad
customer_reviews.text: It is a fine kickboard. But the smell is terrible. And it has not gone away after a use in water. This lives in our boat, and actually overwhelms the "marine" smell when the boat cover is on (if you have a boat, you know the gas, water, blood, sweat, and tears smell). Hope the foam finishes de-gassing soon. I'm actually wondering if the product is genuine, because I can't see a legit factory letting it leave and smell like it does.
customer_reviews.author: TL6

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fun for everyone. We use this for workouts in the pool, our three-year-old uses it to practice kicking, even my senior mom enjoys floating on it. It seems really durable and feels like high quality material.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: good quality, it's sturdy and provides good grip
customer_reviews.text: good quality, it's sturdy and provides good grip. I used it during my recent hawaii trip while snorkeling, to float around and watch the fishes. Be careful if using it as a boogie board - the rough surface can harm the skin. I rested my head on the board for a while, and since my skin was soft from soaking in the water for a long time, it kind of peeled off several layers of skin until I noticed what was going on!
customer_reviews.author: Andreea S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Speedo Gear
customer_reviews.text: Daughter needed another kick board after her previous one disintegrated away (won't mention brand but it wasn't Speedo) and this one was chosen for quality and price. Sturdy, light and built in ridges along the sides for hand grips - great. She is a club swimmer so it is used several times a week both morning and afternoon - pretty sure this will outlast the other just for quality of feel when you hold it. Speedo doesn't disappoint in suits and other gear - so this was a great choice for her too.
customer_reviews.author: Family_Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Poor buoancy, too small, vastly overpriced, made in China for no good reason
customer_reviews.text: It's a tiny slab of rigid foam that probably costs a few pennies to manufacture, so Speedo makes it in China to save a penny or two, and then sells it on Amazon for $15, almost all profit. No matter how I use it, I sink and I'm only 170 pounds. The kickboard should be much more buoyant.
customer_reviews.author: Van Smith

customer_reviews.title: too flexible for me
customer_reviews.text: I am a masters swimmer and I was hoping for a more rigid kick board. This is not it. Way to flexible for me and others of our masters team. If they could make this board more rigid, it would be nicer. As it is, I glued 2 together and they work much better. No smell though. 8/4 - tried using this board again..........just too flimsy!!! Tried finding the Speedo kickboard with the white lettering, no luck. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Trusted brand for a quality product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to improve my kicking strength for my freestyle, breast stroke and butterfly stroke. It works as describe and what makes this a great kick board are the minor details in build quality: - Textured material for non slippage - Grooves on either side of the board for easy placement of the hand - Curved back-end so that the chest lays comfortably on the board - Sleek black color I am very happy with this purchase and would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a board because the pool I use is not allowing use of pool equipment with the Covid pandemic. I had a foam board years ago I had donated to Goodwill. I decided to get this Speedo board after looking at multiple options. Speedo is a great name and it made sense to get a good board. This board supports me during drills and I am a large woman. My hands are able to comfortably grasp the board. This board also fits well in my Speedo mesh equipment bag. It’s a win-win.
customer_reviews.author: Lesli L. Wright-bobholz

customer_reviews.title: I miss the old days
customer_reviews.text: Anyone grow up on a swim team with indestructible kick boards? I mean those things were hard as rocks and lasted through all of the decades of abuse and bite marks. Not this one. The color is vibrant and I enjoy the hand grips, but I could snap this thing in an instant by accident. It’s flimsy. Tecchhnically that’s supposed to make training harder because you’re not depending on it for buoyancy as much, but man I miss those concrete kickboards from the 2000s.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome, easy grip, floats as expected, great for fin work while swimming laps. This is not a flotation device. It is used to assist novice swimmers or use as an aid for lap swimming. I use it while I swim laps to do leg work with fins on. Use as an aid while swimming on your side or hold in front while you work your legs. Works well, dries off quickly.
customer_reviews.author: phil13

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the kickboards we remember from swim practice! Great for your kick practice, both improving form and endurance. Certainly beats hanging on the side of the pool and kicking! (Just a P.S. these are not meant to be used as personal float devices as some have commented.)
customer_reviews.author: Lolly M

customer_reviews.title: Great for practicing kicking!
customer_reviews.text: This kickboard is made out of good material compared to the cheaper ones you usually see in the swim section of your local store. Lives up to the Speedo name. My 5 year old loves to swim but needs work on his kicking and breathing to the side and this board let's him practice those things without worrying about the rest. Great for your emerging swimmer!
customer_reviews.author: MechInspector

customer_reviews.title: Kick Board Size
customer_reviews.text: This is an ackward size. I feel it is more for a child than an adult. I wouldn't buy this again. Just sayin!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kickboard
customer_reviews.text: I typically like smaller kickboards, but although this one is bigger than old style ones, it was surprisingly comfortable to swim several laps with my arms extended in front of me. The negative is the strong plastic odor that takes a long time to go away. I had to sit it outside on the back porch for days but the smell finally subsided to where I don't notice it.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia H.

customer_reviews.title: Good Traithlon Training Tool
customer_reviews.text: This board is great after long rest between Triathlon Training Cycle...it helps to get your lower body warmed up...plus I use it when I get fully fatigued to push put a coupIe more laps...I would recommend to keep on hand...
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Yaniero

customer_reviews.title: Durable Material, size is for Adults
customer_reviews.text: These Speedo ones are the best, a classic. Unlike some cheaper foam versions, you can’t take a chunk out of these. This size is for adults, fitting the length of my forearms. Good for Masters Swimmers and recreational swimmers for training.
customer_reviews.author: New Yorker in Miami

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I was a competitive swimmer growing up and have decided to get back in the pool. I've bought kick boards at the big box stores for my kids and they are very light weight and flimsy. I wanted a real kick board like the ones I used growing up. This is it, but even better. A little more light weight but not too much that it doesn't hold you up at the right level. You swimmers know what I' talking about. Simple fact...Speedo knows swimming and the right equipment you need. As always...well done Speedo.
customer_reviews.author: TayMN

customer_reviews.title: This is a small paddleboard one would use for a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a small paddleboard one would use for a small child. This kickboard is not the correct size for an adult nor does it have hand grips necessary to kick correctly. The pics make the product look much bigger than it is.
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Great kickboard
customer_reviews.text: This kickboard is strong, sealed, and impervious. It is perfect. I'm glad I ordered this one as I swim for physical therapy and this is an exceptional piece of equipment that exceeds expectations. Great job, Speedo!
customer_reviews.author: odgbubba

customer_reviews.title: Truly fun to use in the pool
customer_reviews.text: Being used in an aquafitness class - just what the instructor told me to get and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Dog Garage

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Children 4-8
customer_reviews.text: Most products made by Speedo can be trusted for their high quality and this kickboard is no exception. As a swim instructor for young children, this kickboard provided the perfect amount of support and floatation and is a good size for children 4-8.
customer_reviews.author: JHandy1414

customer_reviews.title: Great kick board for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson used a kick board during swim class so I bought one for him to use in my pool. He uses it to tutor me on my swim techniques - just as his teacher did for him. It's also fun to just get practice kicking with it.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Great doe the pool
customer_reviews.text: This swim board is perfect. It’s the right size that I needed to do my pool exercises. It will hold you up. I would definitely recommend this board. Easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: terry dimaria

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. I doubted that it would hold me, an adult, because of its size but it does! I will admit that you sit a bit lower in the water while using it compared to bigger floats, but while in the water it is like an extension of me. I find myself wanting to go to look at something far away quickly and I unconsciously tuck the kickboard under one arm and swim sideways with great ease...it is that versatile! The best part is when I use a hose to clean after each swim, it dries fast! Love this kickboard.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I had any real use...will not keep head up while swimming....could be me
customer_reviews.author: Jhceagle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s made well. I’m happy with this product and I highly recommend this. It’s perfect for what I need and it’s just the right size for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son is an avid swimmer. This kickboard works well for his swimming drills. It’s sturdy, easy to rest his hands on and does the job he needs it to do. If you’re a true swimmer and you need a board for drills and excercise, I highly recommend this kickboard.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Great swim aid
customer_reviews.text: I liked the Swim board very much. However, the delivery was made while I was away during the day. We had multiple thunderstorms and the box was saturated with water! Fortunately it was the swim board and not a book or clothing inside. Delivery could have been placed between the screendoor and the main door but laid on the porch with no plastic covering. Disappointed in the delivery although very happy with the swim board.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Good Board
customer_reviews.text: Not much to it. I’ve been using kick boards for decades and this one is as good or better than anything I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: ratpac4

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a big swimmer. I purchased this board to help teach my kids to kick. Worked great. Board is sturdy, soft, and easy to grip. It doesn’t seem like it will come apart or break down for a long time. This board provides everything I could want in a kick board.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Holds up!
customer_reviews.text: While I've only used my kickboard a few times in the water, it seems like it's a really good quality and will hold up well. I love using it to build strength in my legs while swimming. The material is very strong and I don't feel like I'm going to break it by just holding on to it, which is nice! I do make it a point to wash it (in the shower by the pool or in our bathtub) to make sure to get all of the pool chemicals off of it. I feel like that will help a LOT when it comes to how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Swim Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Not much really to say. It is a good kit. It does what is needed. Coaches recommended it. A pretty good price for what you get and I see them lasting a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted -- except I wish it came with booklet of exercises
customer_reviews.text: The side grips are comfortable, and the board is exactly as I expected. However, I’ve never used a kickboard before, so I wish it came with a pamphlet of exercises to show you different ways to use it.
customer_reviews.author: LAC

customer_reviews.title: Good board !
customer_reviews.text: I’ve read some review about the smell so I let line outside for a couple of days and the odor of plastic is gone. Easy to hold and great product to learn how to swim or just workout on the water. Strong enough, won’t bend. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Covered in debris.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived covered with debris and when I tried to wipe it off it felt like I had splinters in my hand. Before I took the plastic off it looked like it had glitter all over it but I guess it was fiber glass. This is so disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Great board for swimmers both beginners and advanced
customer_reviews.text: Great board. Honestly all the comments about this board smelling like crap almost discouraged me from purchasing it. The smell is barely noticeable. Not a big deal unless your putting your face on the board, even then, its not bad. The build quality is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: tough workout
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is meant for, a workout in a lap pool.
customer_reviews.author: johnt3765

customer_reviews.title: Swim Cap
customer_reviews.text: I love the blue color that I ordered. It's super soft and doesn't yank my hair out when I take it off!
customer_reviews.author: KaleenL

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Money Kickboard
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 5, but they aren't as sturdy as the ones from back in the day. Luckily I purchased two and and I just stack them together. They are fine for kids as one board, but I prefer two as it seems to provide better flotation. Great for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ries

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy kickboard and also floats very well you can sit on it and you still float
customer_reviews.author: Skylar J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for exercising.
customer_reviews.text: This is what I wanted, it has a great grip and allows me to do laps in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great board, though I still hate kick laps
customer_reviews.text: I hates doing kick laps in high school and I still hate them now. Unfortunately they are an important part of swim workouts, and I end up doing a fair share of them in a seemingly futile attempt to increase leg-propulsion. If you have to do laps, this is a good board to do them with. It's light weight, relatively compact and still provides enough flotation for swimmers like me with large upper bodies. I just purchased a second Speedo kickboard for my wife as she was tired of sharing mine during our evening swims.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect workout kick board for training and to build leg strength
customer_reviews.text: Great swim team workout kickboard. Perfect purchase to get my training back on course. Good buy and if needed I'd buy it again. Also excellent for water therapy to build leg strength.
customer_reviews.author: Entertain Me

customer_reviews.title: A must for training
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, just what I needed for practice. This is much sturdier and better than the ones they have at the pool, highly recommended so far.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyH

customer_reviews.title: I wish the kickboard was a little longer.
customer_reviews.text: I did not notice the offensive odor that some other customers mentioned in their reviews. I am a fairly tall person, so I do wish the kickboard was a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for the pool
customer_reviews.text: I've used a kickboard like this one at my gym to swim laps with. I'm glad to finally have my own & plan to use it at the lake too!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl M. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: Seems more suited for a small child. It would be much better with handles.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Good firm
customer_reviews.text: It is good. It is a bit firmer than I expected. There is a grove around perimeter apparently designed to assist with grip.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph LaFreniere

customer_reviews.title: Good swim tool
customer_reviews.text: Owned this for over a year now, has held up to Florida sun, chlorine and salt water.
customer_reviews.author: Floridave13

customer_reviews.title: Nice Compact Size
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact size to use for my morning workout in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cool
customer_reviews.text: great boogie board. I use for swimming laps. Works well, I have bought several
customer_reviews.author: phil13

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about this product. It os sturdy, easy to grip, and is balanced perfectly. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Raynor

customer_reviews.title: Not Buoyant Enough
customer_reviews.text: Too light. I purchased this for my swim workouts but it isn’t buoyant enough for an adult. It also feels a bit flimsy. Plan to return.
customer_reviews.author: John Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for price
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. A little small, which actually makes it easier to cart around. Allows me to add some kicking laps to my swim workout.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: My son was using the jumpers to get acclimated to the water. Once he was comfortable with the basics of swimming, he used this board to help him hone in on his swimming skills. This board is great for him to continue to learn and get his confidence in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality at a good price! I purchased 2 boards. It should last many years to come because it seems to be a nice quality material, good thickness for durability and hand hold.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne C.

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Sent back way too small for an adult to use in a lap pool
customer_reviews.author: marinjoe

customer_reviews.title: Not that sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for water aerobics and find it not as sturdy as I would prefer. I feel that it will crack in a short amount of use.
customer_reviews.author: Louis J Curren

customer_reviews.title: Great board
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kickboard! It’s very sturdy and I think it’s going to hold up well!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for laps
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews that mentioned a strong odor. I am very sensitive to smells and I do not notice an off odor.
customer_reviews.author: YogiKat

customer_reviews.title: Mildew
customer_reviews.text: Kickboards arrived covered in a fine mildew powder. The mildew smell will not go away. I tried cleaning them, swimming with them in the chlorinated pool and leaving them in the sun. I finally had to throw both boards (I ordered 2) away.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Horrick

customer_reviews.title: Speedo is a great company
customer_reviews.text: Speedo products are always great. I am sure I will use this for many, many years. And, the color will make it really easy to figure out which board is mine!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great for training
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son to use for swimming practice. It does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: F1

customer_reviews.title: Great but a bit expensive
customer_reviews.text: Speedo board works great but a bit expensive. I got it for my older son. He is happy with his new board but I got another cheaper one for my little one to try out, these two work same.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny. B

customer_reviews.title: Good Kickboard
customer_reviews.text: What you would expect from a kickboard. I've used this three times a week for a few months now, and everything is fine. It hasn't turned any weird colors or started missing any chunks. It looks the same. The length is pretty good for my size, it supports my weight just great, it doesn't feel slimy or weird like some other kickboards, and I just like the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie K.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for water workout.
customer_reviews.text: This didn't allow me to do water workouts. It just sunk.
customer_reviews.author: sam spade

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kick boards. I love how firm they are. I was afraid they were going to arrive and be made out of the cheap foam that pool noodles are made out of, but they weren’t.
customer_reviews.author: M Haynes

customer_reviews.title: I should have gotten the bigger one
customer_reviews.text: this size is very difficult to maneuver. Way too small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Good
customer_reviews.text: It's very sturdy! Really good for warm up laps or training in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: _middleV_

customer_reviews.title: Too small for an adult.
customer_reviews.text: Too small for an adult. For a small person, this would be excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lofgran

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this yet for the lake but it is very good quality board. Look forward to improving my swimming technique using this board.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: It does what a kick board does.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to teach my 4 and 7 year old kids to swim. Sturdy and floats, just what I expect from Speedo.
customer_reviews.author: George L.

customer_reviews.title: as expected - no smell that others mentioned
customer_reviews.text: arrived quickly. I purchased the BLUE board and did not experience the smell that other mentioned. Maybe this is based on the color purchased???
customer_reviews.author: Busy Reader

customer_reviews.title: Small for a bigger person?
customer_reviews.text: The kickboard is a bit small for an adult. Maybe it's just me. I'm trying to get back into shape so maybe it works for those who are in great shape. I still use it and look forward to it not feeling so small. ;)
customer_reviews.author: et

customer_reviews.title: Fine for tiny people
customer_reviews.text: For kids. Not for adults. Biggest of the kick boards I could find on Amazon but still very small.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Makes laps fun
customer_reviews.text: Got this for swimming laps at the ymca. It is very sturdy. Nice thickness and ridges on the side make it easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Ma'am

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love It
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to swim. I'm a dancer who needs to do non-weightbearing exercise that strengthens the muscles supporting the knees. This kickboard is the right size for a tallish normal weight person to hang onto, and it rides smoothly on top of the water. it allows me to work out all the muscles in the lower torso efficiently and effectively. It is exactly what I needed to get.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: Safe for children to use
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loved it. Useful to use for swimming leasons. The pool lifeguard liked it. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Denise  B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy kickboard. Harder than the ones kids were used to at swim lessons but seems very durable. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Kickin' kick board
customer_reviews.text: awesome accessory for a lap swim workout... I use it at the end of my workout to do kick drills... oh man, talk about getting a burn on in the quads!! perfect size and shape
customer_reviews.author: Laura @ Island Paws Studio

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love using the kick board to practice my kicks in the water ect.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Allen

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Has a chemical smell that I think will dissipate over time. Love the lime color.
customer_reviews.author: Kris from SD

customer_reviews.title: Kickboard arrived perfectly - it works great - I love the grips that it has
customer_reviews.text: Kickboard arrived perfectly - it works great - I love the grips that it has. So smooth through the water - it glides like a well-oiled boat.
customer_reviews.author: msaonika

customer_reviews.title: A little short
customer_reviews.text: I've been swimming most of my life and swam competitively for decades so I've been around many swim aids. I am 5' 7" and found this kickboard to be a bit too short for me. It works but it's not as comfortable to use as I had hoped, but that's due almost entirely to the length. Other than that, it's a decent kickboard.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Mo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat insubstantial as a kick board for an adout. I'm 5'6" 125 lb. Doesn't hold me up.
customer_reviews.author: Bon Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good. I've used it for 2 months. During the past 2 months I go swimming 3 to 4 times a week for at least an hour and this has stayed in great condition. I recommend this product for anyone looking for a kickboard.
customer_reviews.author: German Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: its what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the Speedo kickboard. I wanted to order Speedo because I thought it would be quality and I am pleased. Kicking it up at the YMCA.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth  B.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This was the same kickboard that I used while learning to swim so I was already familiar with it. It came fast, obviously brand new, and the color matches the picture exactly.
customer_reviews.author: californiagirl

customer_reviews.title: This is great quality. We've been using it all summer in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality. We've been using it all summer in the high desert and it has not faded or warped. Mom, Dad and kids can use it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mom with Ants in Her Pants

customer_reviews.title: High quality kickboard
customer_reviews.text: I just got this for my son's swim practice. It is heavier than other foam kickboards but it is of high quality and I expect it to last a long time. It is quite tall at almost 18" so it barely fit into the large Speedo Performance Pro swim bag. You have to put this kickboard at the very back in order to fully close the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Helen L.Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Speedo kick board just the right size
customer_reviews.text: I like that this kick board is just the right size, light weight and easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: P. Easter

customer_reviews.title: Great to have around the pool
customer_reviews.text: We got a couple and that kids use for practice and just floating around...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like the kick boards at the pool
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate that this is made of high density foam and feels more sturdy than some of the softer kick boards out there. It’s also coated and seems like it will last for years. I’ve only taken it to the pool a handful of times so far, and it is just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

product_meta.title: Speedo Unisex-Adult Swim Training Kickboard Adult
feature_bullets: Textured EVA foam creates a non-slick surface
Side finger scallops promote proper hand position
